member.name: T:BookPubDB.DTOs.AuthorDto
member.summary: Represents a data transfer object (DTO) for an author. This DTO is used to transfer author-related data between different layers of the application while maintaining encapsulation and separation of concerns.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.AuthorDto.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the first name of the author.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.AuthorDto.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the last name of the author.
